OSBase_NextHopIPRoute.c

Author:
Federico Martin Casares (warptrosse@gmail.com)
Contributors:
Description:

This shared library provides resource access functionality for the class Linux_NextHopIPRoute. It is independent from any specific CIM technology.

Definition in file OSBase_NextHopIPRoute.c.
